title: Sony PMW EX1 Firmware Archive
description:
*** THIS IS FOR SONY PMW-EX1 ONLY ***

Sony doesn't provide firmware download and doesn't allow users to upgrade themselves.

They tell you to go to their service center, where they'll charge about $100 for simple firmware upgrade (price varies by country). It takes 10-15 minutes to do it yourself.

Here's every firmware version released since 1.05 in one archive.

Please take extra care and google about firmware upgrade procedure, read forums and check videos on this. YOU MUST USE HIDDEN SERVICE USB PORT, NOT THE ONE NEXT TO COMPONENT OUT. You might brick your camera permanently if you don't follow procedure correctly. You've been warned.

With that said, I've bought used EX1 recently with firmware version 1.05 and just upgraded it to 1.26 using files in this archive.

What's inside:
 
+---1.25
|   |   Installation_Instructions_EN.pdf
|   |   PMW-EX1_1.25_ReleaseNote.pdf
|   |   
|   ---VersionUpTool_PMW-EX1_1.25(Win)
|       |   PMW-EX1_1.25_1151.f.bin
|       |   USBSER_XDCAM_EX_1.04.inf
|       |   VersionUpTool.exe
|       |   
|       +---amd64
|       |       DIFxAPI.dll
|       |       Extract.dll
|       |       
|       ---x86
|               DIFxAPI.dll
|               Extract.dll
|               
+---1.26
|       PMW-EX1_1.26_ReleaseNote.pdf
|       VersionUpTool_PMW-EX1_1.26(Mac).zip
